data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

If the directions are followed, you always face forward. If you face slightly left, you can follow them 8 times. If you face slightly right, you can follow them 0 times. The instructions give you 2 sets of steps. If you always face forward, you cannot follow them 8 times. The starting point is the starting point. So, the answer is yes.

If you always face forward, the direction is always forward. If you always face right or left, the direction is right. If you always face forward or left, the direction is right.
